reviewText: I am a Jay Thomas fan, so this movie did not disappoint. Shelly Long was very funny too.

This is a very good family movie, and children love it!  'Ragtime' (the horse) is simply adorable, and the dialogue is clean.  Adults may find it a bit cheesy, but as long as your kids like it, that's all that counts.

I bought this movie and it is a wonderful movie for children and adults. It is so funny and the animals are so talented. The owner trainer Patty Fairchild did a wonderfully training her animals. It would be a shame to miss out on this movie.

This is a decent family film that had a lot of fluff.  Kids will love it adults not so much.  I wish i had known the animals in it would be talking because that is a pretty over used theme.  So kids will love it because it's kid oriented and parents can stand it.
this is a great movie that the entire family can watch and enjoy
